name: Opening the EUDI Wallet and viewing the dashboard

testSteps.description: Given the user has the EUDI Wallet app installed
When the user opens the EUDI Wallet app
And the user enters their PIN correctly
Then the dashboard page should be displayed

userStory.storyName: Credential issuance process for cross device
userStory.displayName: Credential issuance process for cross device
userStory.narrative:
As a user of the issuer service
  I want to be able to issue a credential
  So that it can be securely added to my EUDI Wallet
